title: Aarki Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Aarki adapter

reward.description: An integer defining the reward (skip) from Aarki

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest Aarki endpoint

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKADN is supported by Aarki

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by Aarki
